name: Make Route: Escape the police
description:
Create a route, collect coins and manage to escape from pursuit, avoiding collisions.

Only the most attentive will be able to overcome all obstacles and achieve the goal.
Analyze and act competently.
Turn on the logic, and plunge into the world in which it will be your main weapon.
Show us what you can do, try to collect all the coins and hide in the garage before the police cars block the roads. Try to track the direction of the police.
This is not a typical puzzle with primitive shapes and solutions in one click. Make Route is a new look at logic games, with an unusual approach and extraordinary vision.

Nice graphics and user-friendly interface are already waiting for you, and 60 currently available game levels are ready to test your strategic skills.
Spend time with pleasure and benefit. Grow up.
Caution! Do not break the brain.
